Package goal.tools.mc.program.goal.trans

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Atom
    Empty interface for atoms.
    Derives<Atom>
    Provides two methods for establishing whether a mental state condition can become (un)derivable if certain updates are brought about to the mental state.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GoalRepository<A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a repository of goals.
    MscSet
    Represents a set of mental state conditions.
    OptionMap<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a mapping from transition classes (i.e.
    RepositoryGoal<A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a goal in a goal repository as implemented by subclasses of GoalRepository.
    TauAnalyzer<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a transition analysis tool set consisting of slicing and partial order reduction methods.
    TauClass<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a transition class.
    TauModule<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a transition module.
    TauStep<T extends Term,A extends Atom,U extends Update>
    Represents a step.
    TauUpdate<A>
    Represents updates that are brought about by execution of a step, transition, or transition class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TauUpdate.Op
    Represents the type of update that are brought about: ADD represents addition, DEL represents deletion.
